advanced.title: Advanced 'Dice Form' Options
advanced.name: Advanced Settings
advanced.label: Configure Dice Form
advanced.hint: Fine tune the general appearance and behavior of the Dice Form.

enableHiddenRolls.name: Add Hidden Roll Toggles
enableHiddenRolls.hint: Add buttons for mutually exclusive hidden roll toggles (Blind, GM and Self Rolls). Requires reload!

enableCoCd100.name: Add CoC d100 Penalty / Bonus Toggles
enableCoCd100.hint: Add buttons for 'Call of Cthulhu' style d100 rolls: reroll 10s-dice and take highest for Penalty / lowest for Bonus. Requires reload!

enableExplodingDice.name: Add Exploding Dice Toggles
enableExplodingDice.hint: Add buttons for mutualy exclusive Exploding Dice toggles. NOT applicable to coin flips, Fudge or d100 rolls! Requires reload!

enableFirstColumn.name: Add additional 1st column for rolling only 1 die
enableFirstColumn.hint: Note: the dice-icon column is always clickable (and rolls 1 die), similar to other online tabletop platfroms.

closeFormOnRoll.name: Enable closing Dice Roller on successful roll
closeFormOnRoll.hint: If enabled, the Dice Roller window will close after each roll.

maxDiceCount.name: Maximum dice thrown
maxDiceCount.hint: The max number of dice (from 1 to 25) you can throw with the Dice Roller. Requires reload!

enableCoins.name: Enable coin tosses
enableCoins.hint: For making coin flips (similar to d2 dice rolls).

enableFudgeDice.name: Enable 'Fudge Dice'
enableFudgeDice.hint: For rolling 'Fudge Dice' (also known as 'Fate Dice') for your Fate and Fudge games.
